title: amumu support?
body: so do you think support amumu and ziggs apc will become a thing in the bot lane in patch 7.7?

replies.body:
No, ziggs really needs more peel and protection, since he's immobile AF.

Either that, or he abuses his long range to bully people and shove the lane, in which case, he still needs protection against ganks/all-ins due to the overextension.

Amumu + Ziggs ult is really good though

I can confirm that Amumu support is viable and hilarious (Also free S+, because it cheats the ranking system by being wildly offmeta - for now). Nobody respects your damage output, it is basically Leona, trading pure defense for damage.

TL;Dr you start relic shield, upgrade it quickly, and go straight into abyssal, usually. If you snowball, just go hp/ap.
This new passive of his would also synergize really well with some ADCs (ha ha) like corki and ziggs.

I used to play Amumu support long before now and it made people lose their shit over it EVEN when i did good on it. Amumu was a decent support before now, it was played once or twice in the LCS. I see amumu support as a a leona with more damage that nobody sees coming.

Seems a nice combo... who knows.

Nobody plays {{champion:157}} +{{champion:54}} bot lane but the few times I tried it was insanely op. So who knows whether a good tactic like this can make it to the meta...
